'''''Vinyar Tengwar 4''''' is the fourth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|3|5}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "''Ondolindeo Otso Andor''" ("Seven Gates of Gondolin") — Ronald Kyrmse
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''Hrestasse'': A New Quenya Dialogue" — Margaret Dean
* "''Essitalmar''" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Entish Verses" — Ben Koolen
